website_summaries.verdict: A comprehensive roadside emergency kit with “99% of everything you will ever need,” in a compact and easily stowable case.
pros: Included towing strap is a nice plus, owners note
Reusable items are sturdy and will likely last through multiple uses, users report
Air compressor’s electric cord easily reaches car’s 12-volt outlet
cons: Air compressor is small and inefficient
Owners would like more storage pockets to better hold everything in the kit
A few feel the first-aid kit needs more items
Headlamp isn’t powerful enough, some report

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit a few months ago for my wife and daughter to store in their cars, but I first went through every piece to check out the quality. I'd say overall there are some really surprisingly high quality items in this kit, especially for the cheap price. Of course, you can't expect top of the line at this price, but it seems like a lot of thought went into making sure that the important stuff was well-made, like the jumper cables and the air pump especially. I now have no problem trusting this kit in my family's vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Saved me time and money!
customer_reviews.text: This kit saved me so much time and money! The portable tire inflator is the reason I bought this specific kit, and I am glad I did! I had a flat tire, and my spare tire was flat too, but the inflator saved me from waiting for a tow. I have used the jumper cables many times as well. Am excellent kit, I highly recommend everyone have this in their vehicles!
customer_reviews.author: Trebeca

customer_reviews.title: This product turned out much better than I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: This product turned out much better than I anticipated. For such a low price, i expected low quality products. Instead, I was pleased to see that all the products in this kit were high quality and practical. There was even a note from the seller thanking for for my business! I have already recommended this product to my co-workers and family. I will continue to recommend this to everyone! Very happy customer! :)
customer_reviews.author: Turd Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: All the emergency items needed, in one handy bag
customer_reviews.text: My son just got his first new car after getting his first post-college job -- he was very pleased with this. It has everything a person could think of that might be needed in an emergency - except a flashlight. I ordered an inexpensive Anker mini-light from Amazon and tucked it into the very convenient storage bag. The whole thing fits well into the trunk of his small car, and I feel like he's well prepared (the window breaker went into the glove box, of course :)). This is a nice product, well priced -- I will likely pick up more for the other drivers in the family.
customer_reviews.author: bluewynne3

customer_reviews.title: Important:  CHECK your car and determine that you too need this Roadside Emergency Package
customer_reviews.text: This Roadside Assistance package arrived quickly and just as fast went into one of our cars. It is amazing and has everything needed to keep us safe. It also comes with a great carry case. I recently looked through our cars to see what was there in the way of emergency car repair equipment. A bunch of old useless stuff, which led to ordering this amazing package. Please everyone look to see what is in your car(s) and then quickly order this amazing assistance package.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Must have safety car set
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my teenagers car & Bonus is the air pump... in my book this is the most important part of this kit!!! Saved use numerous times from being stuck on the road with flat, at least we got to safety & got tire fixed. Quality is great, sturdy case, zipper & easy to use!!! Recommend this for all... safe driving
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks fine, complete kit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this emergency roadside kit as a Christmas gift for my son, who has started commuting to college. Package looks nice, and seems to contain everything I expected. Won't be opened as a gift until Christmas 2018, and then probably won't be opened up completely unless and until he has a roadside emergency to deal with. I guess I give it four stars because it's something he should have. I guess if and when it gets used, I'll revise my review up or down based on his experience with the kit. I bought this kit over others because it includes an air compressor, which is something I have had in my own car for years and found useful multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Brain S Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Came complete and in excellent condition. Has all of the components I would compile if I were buying them separately. Tried out the air pump and it worked as advertised. The only thing that I would add is a thermal blanket (mylar?) or two. They would be handy in an emergency. The rest of the first aid pouch is adequate. I saw a nurse dismiss the first aid bag, but you could always add items to that. I'm not going to do any suturing or injecting anything into anybody ... clear the airway, pressure on the wound, and treat for shock.
customer_reviews.author: Bob C.

customer_reviews.title: Great First Aid Kit
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sister in law for Christmas and it was larger/heavier than I thought. Being an RN myself, I wouldn’t mind buying one for myself now since it seemed to be really helpful and have a good variety of medical items that would be needed in an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Amy K

customer_reviews.title: Hope we never need it, but glad we have it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an emergency car care kit for my sons first car. I bought it with a car crate and several other items. This appears to have everything he will need and seems to be good quality. I liked the fact that it includes a compressor, tow straps and jumper cables. The kit has yet to be tested. Hoping he will never need it, but glad he has it.
customer_reviews.author: Luki

customer_reviews.title: It's far bigger and heavier than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: As stated, it's much bigger and heavier than I anticipated, plus it gives off a noxious chemical-like oder. And when I tried to return it Amazon will not accept it saying it contains harmful gases. NOT recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dutch Fred

customer_reviews.title: Great for my collegiate daughters...dad can still help protect them
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters to keep in their cars. While I can be there every minute to help them, at least I can feel that I have helped them help themselves. The air pump is very helpful also, since airing up bike tires for riding to classes on campus is a challange since every place wants to charge for air these days. The only thing I have added to this kit is a 20oz can of Fix-A-Flat, in the event of a tire puncture and an emergency blanket (Kevlar) since our winters can get cold and wet.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Matcham

customer_reviews.title: One of those things you hope you never have to use, but....
customer_reviews.text: Gave this kit to my daughter when she went away to college in here used car. After taking some time going through how to use the various items, off she went! hope if she will never have to use it, but the kit was very well thought out and of good quality and does inspire some peace of mind for anxious parents.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Wolter

customer_reviews.title: fortunately. Jumpers seem sturdy and of a good gauge
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these, one for each car. Seems high quality, I haven't had to use anything from it, fortunately. Jumpers seem sturdy and of a good gauge. Nice assortment in a compact carrier.
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: Great emergency kit!!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this purchase it is how I expected. Nice strong bag with extra room so it will be easy to fit everything back in. I used the medical kit yesterday for an elderly woman who had a large gash on her leg and it worked great. I may use the medical kit for my back pack and keep another kit in the car because this one is so nice and compact.
customer_reviews.author: sara smith

customer_reviews.title: Kinda Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Safety items will work for what intended for. Somethings in the picture are not exactly what you’ll receive. The multi tool is cheap and not like a gerber and the knife on it is dull. The headlamp is also really cheap and couldn’t open it to put the battery in it. If I pry it I’ll break it since the plastic is cheap. Probably more worth about $10.
customer_reviews.author: Thania S.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality well thought out kit.
customer_reviews.text: Great and complete roadside kit with high quality products. I also purchased a more complete first aid kit but, this kit comes with a decent one. The one disappointment is the headlight flashlight (You wear it around your head). The quality was inferior to the rest of the kit. Could not get it to turn on - the battery does not make perfect contact. I purchased 2 kits and one flashlight worked and the other didn't. Recommend they include a better flashlight -- perhaps 2 flashlights.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J Rao

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sturdy kits
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these kits for our two new cars. The cases are very sturdy and everything is packed really well. The only surprise was that the manufacturer hid a free warranty extension card inside of the kit, but at least they had the common sense to mention it during a post-delivery email.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Vera

customer_reviews.title: Safety First
customer_reviews.text: While I was stationed in Germany it was a requirement to have a kit in your car. I bought this because we live in SC and the drivers are horrible, so it’s best to be prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Bersamina

customer_reviews.title: Safty
customer_reviews.text: This emergency kit was a gift for Christmas....going to my 26 year old daughter. Who spends a lot of time driving..So I can't to much comment on the kit it's self..as it hasn't been opened yet.. I will however comment on the fact that it was delivered sooner than I expected ..The packaging was good..The case for the kit is very well make and very attractive..I will have to wait to comment on the products inside....
customer_reviews.author: Linda Pastrana

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: We went to the "big stores" out there, and did not find anything like this kit. They all had SOME of it, but not all of it. This is for our grandson with his first car. A beater. We want to make sure he is going to be able to be equipped with the safety things he may need. This kit really had a lot to offer, especially for the price. We are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: mongamomma

customer_reviews.title: Most complete kit I found!
customer_reviews.text: I researched a lot of car kits and found that this one was the most complete and best value for the money. The tow strap, window breaker/seatbelt cutter and air compressor together in one kit was something that not a lot of the other kits had. The kit was a gift and the recipient was thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Solid kit, multitool is lacking.
customer_reviews.text: The kit is full of decent emergency and roadside assistance. But the multi tool is comically poor quality, the knife is litterally unsharpened. But the rest of the kit is just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Weston Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Roadside Kit
customer_reviews.text: Great kit that comes with variety of prducts! Good quality and reliable. Very convenient and nice storage bag to keep you organized in the back of your car. Definitely worth the purchase. Also liked the safety manual and sheet in case you need to take notes if ever in an accident.
customer_reviews.author: cz

customer_reviews.title: Roadside Emergency Relief for Mom
customer_reviews.text: I received the Emergency Road kit today for my Son's vehicle and I am so pleased. Thank you for the inclusion of medical supplies and lights. I feel much safer knowing this kit is inside the trunk of my Son's car in the event he should ever need it. I am now going to buy four more, for my girls because this one had the great quality I was looking for at a price that I could afford. Thank you First Secure!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angelia

customer_reviews.title: pump and air pressure meter not working, return requested!
customer_reviews.text: Hi, recently I used the pump in the kit. It is not working at all. The air pressure measurement is totally wrong and misleading. The pump doesn't make any difference on the tire after pumping for a long time. (I checked with another pump, the tire is totally okay). I would request to return the kit and have my money back. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: popabczhang

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Everything fits in the bag. Hopefully I will never need to use anything in it. Felt that it was good to have in the car. I am not a mechanical car woman so I am thinking it all looks good??? I also have AAA just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful kit!
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit! It has been a life saver. It has just about everything you need! The tire patch kit has come in handy. The MVP of the kit is the little air compressor for your tires. Very nice to have so you don’t have to drive to the gas station and fill up your tires.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Necessary Car Kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a good all encompassing kit. The kit is full of essential items everyone should have in their car. The most important item for us was an air pump, this one has it. I didn't give a 5 star rating because: I had to WD-40 the multi tool and work it for about 10-15 mins to get to open and close without such a struggle. Also, there's no real flashlight. Yes, there's the little head lamp however, it only provides a small and direct beam of light. I also added a chemical ice pack to the first aid bag that picked up at the pharmacy.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great roadside safety kit.
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Has everything you would need to be safe if ever on the side of the road. Nothing to fix anything, but it will aid very well in getting your vehicle to a safe location or state. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This comes with everything I need when on the road. As a commuter, can’t believe it took me this long to purchase something like this. I did research to try and find most of the items for a cheaper price and always came back to this. I feel like I have gotten the most for my money.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Most everything you'd need.
customer_reviews.text: Such a great price for what you get. I like that this kit doesn't have a lot of random, basically worthless filler crap. Just stuff that you might really need. (I did add emergency blankets, food and water) The bag is flimsy but the stuff inside doesn't seem to be and that's what's important. I ordered two kits- in one the multi tool was broken but the company swiftly set things right. I'll be ordering a couple more for gifts this Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got You Covered!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use anything from h ere just yet. That said this is a very robust Kit for the Price! Very Neat and Compact and the items seam well made! I will update this review upon use
customer_reviews.author: noktern

customer_reviews.title: This really does have everything for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teenage son to keep in his truck, he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE

customer_reviews.title: Air pump doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I tried using the air pump on my BMW M6, but it didn't work. That was the main reason why i bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P.

customer_reviews.title: Decent kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: You get many pieces that can be helpful with multiple stranded or emergency situations for a very reasonable price. I bought three for Christmas presents, one for my two young adult son's and one for another young man who has become nearly another son to us. It is something that most younger adults do not realize is important to have in the age of smart phones and roadside assistance. Even if they don't need it for themselves they can assist others in distress until help arrives.
customer_reviews.author: DBD

customer_reviews.title: Invaluable
customer_reviews.text: Invaluable every car should have one. The air compressor useful
customer_reviews.author: Old Rugged

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind in a Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great kit! I just started a new job with a considerable commute. I wanted to have this kit in my trunk for peace of mind. I do hope that I never have to use it but if something comes up I feel confident I have the tools to get through a situation. Or, if I see someone else in trouble, I can stop and help them. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: lauraloveschocolate

customer_reviews.title: I feel at ease having this in my car
customer_reviews.text: I fortunately haven’t had to use this emergency car kit yet, but if I ever need to I feel confident that its contents will assist me in my crisis. The contents of the kit appear durable and there seems to be an item for every situation. For the price I paid, this seems to be a steal! (Will update review IF kit is ever used)
customer_reviews.author: Terri Carolan

customer_reviews.title: Practical gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these kits for two of my children. I like feeling assured they will be prepared in an emergency. I chose this kit because it has the portable air compressor. I feel it is well with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mu5chMoM

customer_reviews.title: First Secure 90-Piece Car Emergency Kit
customer_reviews.text: I have had the emergency car kit for about 3 days. Haven't had the the need to use it but glad it's in the vehicle knowing that the snow is coming. What really made me chose this car kit was the fact that it had a compressor in it. Sometimes you just need to add a little air. I gave 4 stars because I like it's contents but haven't used any of them.
customer_reviews.author: valarie medina

customer_reviews.title: What you need for roadside preparedness.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to give as a gift. I chose this kit after comparing to several others. It came timely, it's neatly all in a case. I liked the variety of items included. Recipient was happy to receive it.
customer_reviews.author: KitKat

customer_reviews.title: This is THE car emergency kit!
customer_reviews.text: I looked for HOURS for a good but reasonably priced emergency kit for a car for an upcoming road trip. This comes with ALOT of helpful tools from tire repair to inflating a flat, jumping cables and so much more. This is the best bang for your buck, seeing it comes with so much quality tools for many situations you could encounter on a road.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Ornelas

customer_reviews.title: Great Safety & Security Product
customer_reviews.text: Our emergency kits arrive on time and look great. Best Christmas gifts to buy for our Grandchildren now driving their own cars. Each kit has everything and more you need in emergency. Also includes the handy seat belt & window cutter a must.
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne Cianfrani

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter so she could be safe on the road in case of emergencies. The tow strap is of good quality and heavy enough for her little CRV. I like the tire plug kit with 12v inflator. She may not know how to use it all but she can always ask a creepy stranger for help with it.
customer_reviews.author: Corey P

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy. Only thing that's a bit off is ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent buy. Only thing that's a bit off is I didn't expect every bandage in the first aid kit to count as an item to make it 90 pieces. I thought the first aid kit was 1 item of 90
customer_reviews.author: Henry Walter Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Use for a shopping list of items to make your own emergency kit
customer_reviews.text: The jumper cables weren’t powerful enough to jump start my Lexus RX350. Had to call AAA who came and jump started the vehicle with zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: EJM

customer_reviews.title: This comprehensive kit is good quality for a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: My commute is a long one and it's always a concern that I will be stuck in the middle of nowhere without the right tools to keep me safe. The First Secure 90 Piece Roadside Emergency Car and Truck Kit comes with everything I could possibly need. Buying all the tools and accessories separately would have been inconvenient and expensive. This comprehensive kit is good quality for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Camelia0425

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have just in case
customer_reviews.text: Really like this kit. Compact yet has a lot of equipment. Especially like the portable air pump and tire patching kit. Would recommend if you travel a lot like I do. Things happen. Better to be prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Perdue

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and quality products
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this is a great emergency kit for your car in case you run into trouble. The products that are included seem to be decent quality and are useful. Great kit to get for your teenage drivers.
customer_reviews.author: Armyro4

customer_reviews.title: Good kit, but...... That light
customer_reviews.text: The roadside kit contains everything you need for a roadside emergency. The only thing I disliked about the kit was the head mounted light. I tried to open it to install the included batteries but ended up breaking the light. I guess I was squeezing it a bit too hard and cracked the case. The battery cover is very hard to remove but no worries. I already had a light. This is the only reason I give it 4 stars, otherwise the kit is well organized and complete.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Ford

customer_reviews.title: Everything feels cheap- save your money
customer_reviews.text: Lots of items but it all feels cheaply made. I mainly bought this for the air compressor, haven't tried it yet but the charger part that goes in the cigarette lighter feels like it won't last more than a couple uses. Same with the tire pressure gauge.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: The kit offers a lot for the price, the safety reflector is very flimsy, could snap or crack very easily though. There is no slot to store the air compressor needles either, which could get lost real easily. I'd rate the product a 5 if it weren't for these two concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay I can't say how well this kit was thought ...
customer_reviews.text: Okay I can't say how well this kit was thought out! from the air pump to the tow strap and all the little goodies in between! got one and now I want one in all my cars!
customer_reviews.author: Fireguy

customer_reviews.title: Great set to have in the car
customer_reviews.text: I chose this emergency kit, because it includes about all of the things that I would have bought separately. I wasn't sure if the quality would be very good, but it does have pretty nice stuff in there, and it all fits into a zippered bag. Super handy. Given how much you get for $50, this was a really good deal. We'll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: karl

customer_reviews.title: Bought as gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my folks. They seem to like it and fortunately haven't had a need to actively use it. I didn't open it up and inspect the items, so I can't speak for the quality of the individual pieces.
customer_reviews.author: haboylan

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product and its contents. What I really like is how the case opens. It unzips all the way around and opens like a suitcase, this way you can see all the contents easily. Many other safety kits are a zipper top bag and you have to dig around in the bag or even empty it to find what you want. A fantastic purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Banks

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful Roadside Kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit is well made and has the essential items in a good quality enclosure that fits my SUV storage nicely. I recommend taking the first aid kit out of the kit itself that you are probably putting in a trunk and placing it in the glove compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Kinchen J. Searcy

customer_reviews.title: ... had to use it yet but appears to be good quality, only way it could improve is having ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use it yet but appears to be good quality, only way it could improve is having compartments inside the bag to keep things organized, but I am sure the low cost reflects this minor flaw. Does have room to add more items like road flares, which I did.
customer_reviews.author: Bret Bond

customer_reviews.title: Prepping for a road trip!
customer_reviews.text: I like the compactness and the variety of essentials. Doesn't take up much space in the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit as a gift for my granddaughter, who will be going to college in the fall and driving a bit of a distance to come home on holidays. The kit is exactly what i had in mind. It was delivered on time and very well packed. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Good vehicle emergency kit
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for the vehicle has all the necessities to help you out in emergency situations. It’s hard to be prepared for every situation but this kit is compact and certainly can provide some necessary help in adverse situations on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Torbic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great to have incase of an emergency. Feels like good quality
customer_reviews.author: Eli Red

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Short tow cable. I used the jumpers twice. They work great but look kind of cheap how you peel the two cables away from each other. Putting the stuff back in after its been used isn't the easiest design.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice kit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Xmas. She picked it out herself and had it on her wish list. Very nice kit! I'll likely buy one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Livering

customer_reviews.title: Prompt delivery
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly as promised. This emergency kit for the car is just what a new - or seasoned - driver needs to have on hand for all the unexpected events.
customer_reviews.author: KCStar

customer_reviews.title: I purchased Piece of Mind
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully my kids will never have to use these but since they are away at college I got these for them to have for when I can’t be there. The kit appears very well put together and has everything that I was looking for. Packaging is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Got it as a gift for my Granddaughter and her ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for my Granddaughter and her first car. It has everything you need and hope she never has to use it. But it she did I know it will come in handy for almost any emergency while on the road.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Basic kit,  compact.
customer_reviews.text: Nice car emergency set. Bought as a gift for my daughter. Would have liked it to contain a 4 way wrench though but no emergency kit's had that included. Will buy and bungee strap it to the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L

customer_reviews.title: Tire inflator
customer_reviews.text: Bought this emergency set because it comes with a tire inflator. I would hate to wake up one morning with a flat or low tire. Still have not use the set but we plan to take a road trip to Mt Rushmore and want to feel safe and reassured on the road that IF something happens that I’m prepared for that eventuality! Like the price and quickness in delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Great when you need it!
customer_reviews.text: Used it the other day when my 73 beetle konked out on the bridge. No one ran into me because of the included hazard triangle. So- I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Ross Stewart Andrew CPSE WACS ACF AAC

customer_reviews.title: Safety first
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas present for a new teen drive. It has the year round essentials. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Love it great buy
customer_reviews.text: Every woman need to have this for their car come with everything you can think of
customer_reviews.author: carlisha

customer_reviews.title: Pretty complete emergency kit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as Xmas gifts so haven't opened them yet but they are of nice size, not too big or small, and seem to have about all emergencies covered.
customer_reviews.author: Dapusher

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I got two set, one for my husband and the other one for my son (especially for him because he's driving his first car). Really nice set! A complete emergency road kit.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Provides necessities
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this kit provides the necessities in the event that you are stranded on the side of the road, have a dead battery, or a medical problem until helps arrives. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Vines

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, with good quality products
customer_reviews.text: Great kit, with good quality products. A lot of these kits have the cheapest junk possible, but this one is top of the line. I bought this for my wife, and then I bought one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived undamaged & in perfect condition. Made a great birthday gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha D

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my grandson to keep in his first car. It looks like a quality set and the carrying case is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for all that the set includes. A lot of essentials are included and I didn’t have to buy each piece individually. Another big plus is that it has lifetime warranty, which I didn’t when I first purchased. It’s definitely worth the investment for peace of mind while on the road, especially for long distance drives.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: don't leave home without this in your car!
customer_reviews.text: I have a long commute to work and ordered one of these to keep in my car. I just got it and it's amazing! It has everything but the kitchen sink. I'm going to order 3 more for my adult daughters to keep in their cars too!
customer_reviews.author: LouAnn

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for anyone who owns a vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a gift. I made sure this item included an air pump and pressure gauge. She called me saying it was a bag full of great items that she never realized she needed.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for a newer driver. Only thing I didn’t see was fuses which would be a good add but overall it’s a great kit.
customer_reviews.author: Frank C.

customer_reviews.title: I really happy I got this kit
customer_reviews.text: I really happy I got this kit. 2 days after I bought it I came out to a flat that I was able to take care of, and a week or so later I used it to jump my buddies car. It is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: What a great price for peace of mind as well as security for my girls to have out on the road!!
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need, very high quality
customer_reviews.text: Feels like I'm hardly ever impressed with anything I buy anymore. It all feels cheaply made so that the company can extract max profits and nothing else. They got my dime and don't care if I got anything in return. That's not the case here. I'm very pleased with each and every item included here. Just a tremendous value.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Korman

customer_reviews.title: A kit "For WOMEN and Men"
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for letting me know the kit could be used by both men and women! As a 27 year old female, it's always refreshing to know ahead of time if my dainty hands, feeble arms, or small brain will be able to grasp the complex use of tools. Without such a blatant disclaimer, "for women", how else would we know what we can and can't use?! Equality!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Grateful for the kit
customer_reviews.text: As this kit was a gift to a recipient in upstate NY I have no personal review. However, the recipient was extremely happy and thankful to own such an emergency kit with all items she requires for driving on highways around the state.....and,feeling more secure ,in any event.
customer_reviews.author: Terry P

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR ROADSIDE EMERGENCIES
customer_reviews.text: Packaged perfectly, all the right tools necessary for when you are stuck on the side of the road or any road side emergency. Definitely know what they are doing!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great car emergency kit!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the kit for my son as a Christmas gift, he loves how many things are included in the kit!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Good quality merchandise
customer_reviews.text: A nice complete car emergency kit. Good to have the piece of mind that you can handle any emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Aruba85

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Emergency Kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for my daughter and was very pleased with the kit. A couple of ideas to improve on it is sewing a pocket or another strap on the opposite side of the cables, compressor to secure other loose items and/or add a clear plastic zipper bag for keeping the small stuff together like tape, tie wraps, etc. In any case, still offers great functionality and value!
customer_reviews.author: Gary H Quick

customer_reviews.title: Good kit to have
customer_reviews.text: Good kit to have in your car. Have not used any items and hope to not have to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty impressed with the quality of the things in this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Lau

customer_reviews.title: Good basic kit
customer_reviews.text: Good basic kit, overall made of decent supplies. Definitely not high quality, but you don't use it everyday so it will get the job done in an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K.

customer_reviews.title: Great and comprehensive!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for all the essentials. I got this for my teen who is about to start driving. It’s perfect for this.
customer_reviews.author: J. K. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect combination of emergency roadside accessories. Unfortunately the compressor failed after one use.
customer_reviews.author: blondnomore

customer_reviews.title: The kit is awesome! It is filled with everything you need in ...
customer_reviews.text: The kit is awesome! It is filled with everything you need in case you get in trouble. The kit has a nice carrying case and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: mary panzegraf

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool kit with a lot of options
customer_reviews.text: Nice tool kit with a lot of options. Only problem that i found was that the zip of the tool kit bag seems very fragile ( prone to breakage) and of low quality. Otherwise okay
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad Mujtaba Hassan

customer_reviews.title: Great selection of emergency items.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my daughter who travels alone quite a bit. Has the necessary items for simple roadside emergencies to make her more comfortable driving. Nicely packaged and easy to stow in the vehicle. One of those things you hope she never has to use!
customer_reviews.author: KRaw

product_meta.title: Car Emergency Kit First Aid Kit – Premium, Heavy Duty Car Roadside Emergency Kit – Jumper Cables, Portable Air Compressor, Tow Strap, Tire Pressure Gauge, Headlamp – Car Accessories for Women and Men
feature_bullets: 🚗 MANY CAR SAFETY KITS HAVE FLIMSY, LOW QUALITY TOOLS that BREAK, MELT and FALL APART. At First Secure, we’ve made our Car Emergency Kit with STRONG, DURABLE TOOLS that are designed for TOP PERFORMANCE and LASTING QUALITY. Our 10-foot, 8-gauge, 300-amp jumper cables are made of COPPER-CLAD ALUMINUM, so they won’t melt. Our 11.8-foot, 10,000 lb HIGH-TENSILE nylon tow strap is stronger and longer than most. Unlike plastic air pumps, our 12V, 250 PSI air pump is made of STURDY materials.

🚗 UNLIKE OTHER CAR EMERGENCY KITS THAT INCLUDE USELESS “FILLER” SUPPLIES, our roadside kit contains only premium tools that are ESSENTIAL TO EMERGENCY SITUATIONS – many of which you won’t find in other auto tool kit s. Some of these UNIQUE ITEMS INCLUDE a 7-Piece Tire Repair Kit, an 11.8 ft Tow Rope with 10,000-lb towing capacity, a Window Breaker, a Portable Air Compressor, and a 10-ft Jumper Cable.

🔧 90-PIECE PREMIUM ROADSIDE SET + 48-PIECE FIRST AID KIT. Our all-inclusive car survival kit includes a complete first-aid kit and HEAVY-DUTY, ALL-WEATHER TOOLS AND SUPPLIES for any roadside emergency: Reflective Warning Triangle, Jumper Cables, Air Compressor, Headlamp with LED Bulb, Tow Rope, Tire Repair Kit, Window Breaker, Tire Pressure Gauge, 9-Piece Multi Tool, Electrical Tape, Bungee Cords, Cable Ties, and Work Gloves.

🎁 THE PERFECT COMPLETE AUTO EMERGENCY KIT. Our emergency car kit is an ESSENTIAL TRAVEL COMPANION and winter car kit tool bag for road trippers, commuters, and families, and makes an ideal travel kit for women, car accessories for men and GIFT FOR NEW DRIVERS and high school and college students. Keep yourself and your loved ones safe and PROTECTED ON THE ROAD with our all-inclusive emergency survival kit and car tool kit emergency.

✅ AT FIRST SECURE, OUR TOP PRIORITY IS KEEPING YOUR LOVED ONES SAFE with our DURABLE, HIGH-PERFORMING EMERGENCY TOOLS. We take pride in our premium quality products and OUTSTANDING CUSTOMER SERVICE. If for any reason you aren’t satisfied with your car emergency tool kit with jumper cables, we will RETURN YOUR PAYMENT IN FULL – no questions asked. Please don’t hesitate to reach out to us directly so we can MAKE IT RIGHT.
